data.base_url_description: Enter the base URL for the Sensus Analytics API (e.g., https://api.sensus.com).
data.account_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics account (customer) number.
data.water_meter_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics water meter number.
data.water_unit_type_description: Select the water unit type. 'CF' stands for Cubic Feet and 'G' stands for Gallons.
data.water_tier1_gallons_description: Enter the number of gallons for Tier 1. Leave blank if not applicable.
data.water_tier1_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 1 (e.g., 0.00717).
data.water_tier2_gallons_description: Enter the number of gallons for Tier 2. Leave blank if not applicable.
data.water_tier2_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 2 (e.g., 0.00789).
data.water_tier3_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 3 (e.g., 0.00867).
data.water_service_fee_description: Enter the fixed service fee amount (e.g., 15.17).

data.base_url_description: Enter the base URL for the Sensus Analytics API (e.g., https://api.sensus.com).
data.account_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics account (customer) number.
data.water_meter_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics water meter number.
data.water_unit_type_description: Select the water unit type. 'CF' stands for Cubic Feet and 'G' stands for Gallons.
data.water_tier1_gallons_description: Enter the number of gallons for Tier 1. Leave blank if not applicable.
data.water_tier1_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 1 (e.g., 0.00717).

sensus_analytics_water_meter_address.name: Water Meter Address
sensus_analytics_water_meter_address.description: Street address of the water meter.

sensus_analytics_water_last_read.name: Last Read
sensus_analytics_water_last_read.description: Timestamp of the last meter reading.

sensus_analytics_water_meter_latitude.name: Meter Latitude
sensus_analytics_water_meter_latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the meter's location.

sensus_analytics_water_meter_longitude.name: Meter Longitude
sensus_analytics_water_meter_longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the meter's location.

sensus_analytics_water_last_hour_timesta.name: Last Hour Timestamp
sensus_analytics_water_last_hour_timesta.description: Timestamp of the last hour's data from the previous day.

sensus_analytics_water_usage_unit.name: Water Usage Unit
sensus_analytics_water_usage_unit.description: Water native unit of measurement chosen by Sensus Analytics.

sensus_analytics_water_meter_id.name: Water Meter ID
sensus_analytics_water_meter_id.description: Unique identifier for the water meter.

sensus_analytics_water_latest_read_usage.name: Latest Read Water Usage
sensus_analytics_water_latest_read_usage.description: Latest cumulative water usage recorded by the meter.

sensus_analytics_water_billing_usage.name: Water Billing Usage
sensus_analytics_water_billing_usage.description: Total water usage amount that has been billed.

sensus_analytics_water_billing_cost.name: Water Billing Cost
sensus_analytics_water_billing_cost.description: Total cost of the billed water usage.

sensus_analytics_water_daily_fee.name: Water daily Fee
sensus_analytics_water_daily_fee.description: Water daily fee based on usage.

sensus_analytics_water_last_hour_usage.name: Last Hour Usage
sensus_analytics_water_last_hour_usage.description: Water usage for the last hour.

sensus_analytics_water_meter_odometer.name: Water Meter Odometer
sensus_analytics_water_meter_odometer.description: Total cumulative usage recorded by the water meter.

sensus_analytics_water_hourly_timestamp.name: Hourly Timestamp
sensus_analytics_water_hourly_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last hour's data from the previous day.
